title: The only thing i dont like about Galio is his E Justice punch
body: because when i try to get away if theres someone behind he gets knocked up.

replies.body: When I first saw it I instantly thought of old galios e.  It was also his movement ability but instead of fixing the problem with the update and giving him a quality of life buff (he has to stop moving to cast his movespeed up ability) they somehow misinterpreted that as one of his unique qualities and made it even worse with his new e by forcing him to move back to move forward.
